name: minio-cache
description: Github action to cache to S3
author: Philip Lehmann

scripts.package: ncc build -o dist/restore src/restore.ts && ncc build -o dist/save src/save.ts
scripts.all: yarn format && yarn build && yarn package
scripts.release: yarn all && git add -A && gh release create "$(npm version patch --git-tag-version=false)" -t Release -d=false -n "" -p=false && git commit -m="Release" && git push origin main && git push --tags
